commit.message:
asan_mapping.h (kMidMemEnd): Increase to 0x4fffffffffULL.

	* asan/asan_mapping.h (kMidMemEnd): Increase to 0x4fffffffffULL.
	* asan/asan_rtl.cc (__asan_init): Increase kMidMemEnd to
	0x4fffffffffULL.
